Immunities.string: poison; piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

MonsterTrait.Name: Withered Tresses
MonsterTrait.Text: If a rusalka is kept out of water for 24 consecutive hours, its hair and body dry into desiccated swamp weeds and the creature is utterly destroyed.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The rusalka's innate casting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: control water, suggestion, tongues, water walk (can be ended freely at will) 1/day: dominate person

MonsterTrait.Name: Watery Camouflage
MonsterTrait.Text: In dim light or darkness, a rusalka that's underwater is invisible.

MonsterAction.Name: Breathless Kiss
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: the target is grappled (escape DC 13) and the rusalka draws all the air from the target's lungs with a kiss. If the rusalka has movement remaining, she drags the grappled creature into deep water, where it begins suffocating.

MonsterTrait.Name: Drowning Hair (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The rusalka's long hair tangles around a creature the rusalka has grappled. The creature takes 33 (6d10) necrotic damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Constitution saving throw. In addition, until it escapes the rusalka's grapple, it is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks to break free of the grapple.
